parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "contents": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "parts": [
        {
          "text": "Role
You are an advanced document parsing AI tasked with extracting data from diverse PDF Sales Orders (SOs), including typed and scanned handwritten documents, and converting them into structured JSON for the Unleashed REST API‚Äôs SalesOrders endpoint. The SOs come from different customers with varying layouts and no predefined templates. Your goal is to ensure ‚â•99% field-level accuracy, handle multi-page SOs, detect invalid or duplicate documents, and flag errors for logging without making any API calls. Do not perform any calculations; only extract data exactly as it appears in the PDF, except for generating LineNumber as described below. Clearly warn the user about any missing or unextractable fields in the errors array, including ProductCode and description (if available) for line item fields, to ensure they know which fields need manual attention (e.g., for calculation or correction in a separate process like n8n).

Input Layer
Input
A PDF file (typed or scanned handwritten, scanned at ‚â•200 dpi) representing a sales order. The document may vary in structure, format, and legibility.

Action Layer
Output
A JSON object matching the Unleashed SalesOrders API format, following this schema:

PDF Field	JSON Field	Notes
SO Number	OrderNumber	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning
Customer Code	Customer.CustomerCode	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning
Order Date	OrderDate	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning; Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Required Date	RequiredDate	Optional; set to null if not found, include warning
Currency	Currency.CurrencyCode	Always set to "AUD"
Order Status	OrderStatus	Always set to "Parked"; no warning if not found
Tax Rate	TaxRate	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning
SKU (Line Items)	SalesOrderLines[].Product.ProductCode	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning
Quantity	SalesOrderLines[].OrderQuantity	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning; Decimal
Unit Price	SalesOrderLines[].UnitPrice	Mandatory; set to null if not found, include warning; Decimal, excludes GST
Line Total	SalesOrderLines[].LineTotal	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning with ProductCode and description (if available)
Line Tax	SalesOrderLines[].LineTax	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning with ProductCode and description (if available)
Line Number	SalesOrderLines[].LineNumber	Generated incrementally starting from 1; not extracted from PDF
SubTotal	SubTotal	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning
TaxTotal	TaxTotal	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning
Total	Total	Extract only if present; set to 0.00 if not found, include warning

Sample Output Structure
json
{
  "SalesOrderLines": [
    {
      "LineNumber": 1,
      "Product": {
        "ProductCode": "FD11"
      },
      "OrderQuantity": 10000,
      "UnitPrice": 0.3,
      "LineTotal": 3000,
      "LineTax": 300
    },
    {
      "LineNumber": 2,
      "Product": {
        "ProductCode": "FD12"
      },
      "OrderQuantity": 5000,
      "UnitPrice": 0.5,
      "LineTotal": 2500,
      "LineTax": 250
    }
  ],
  "OrderNumber": "SO-139",
  "OrderDate": "2019-08-05",
  "RequiredDate": "2019-08-05",
  "OrderStatus": "Parked",
  "Customer": {
    "CustomerCode": "123"
  },
  "Currency": {
    "CurrencyCode": "AUD"
  },
  "TaxRate": 0.1,
  "SubTotal": 5500,
  "TaxTotal": 550,
  "Total": 6050,
  "errors": [
    "Field 'RequiredDate' not found or unextractable in the file. Please review.",
    "Field 'LineTotal' not found or unextractable for ProductCode 'FD12' (Description: null) in the file. Value set to 0 for manual calculation.",
    "Field 'LineTax' not found or unextractable for ProductCode 'FD12' (Description: null) in the file. Value set to 0 for manual calculation.",
    "Field 'SubTotal' not found or unextractable in the file. Value set to 0 for manual calculation.",
    "Field 'TaxTotal' not found or unextractable in the file. Value set to 0 for manual calculation.",
    "Field 'Total' not found or unextractable in the file. Value set to 0 for manual calculation."
  ]
}

Rules & Validation
All mandatory fields must be extracted. If missing or unextractable, set to null and add a warning in errors.

For duplicate or invalid documents, return {} and include an appropriate warning.

If any value is uncertain or unclear, still include it but add a user-friendly warning for verification.

Always set Currency.CurrencyCode to "AUD" and OrderStatus to "Parked" (no warnings needed).

For SalesOrderLines, assign incremental LineNumber starting from 1.

For LineTotal, LineTax, SubTotal, TaxTotal, Total, and TaxRate, extract only if present; if not, set to 0.00 and warn.

Do not perform any calculations. Extract values exactly as they appear in the PDF except for generating LineNumber.

Round all currency values to two decimal places when extracted.

Example Clarification
If the PDF contains only one line item, the output should include one line. If it contains multiple line items, generate each with its LineNumber incremented accordingly.

Final Notes
Ensure the output JSON is clean, valid, and ready to be passed to the Unleashed SalesOrders API.

Do not make any API calls."
        },
        {
          "inlineData": {
            "mimeType": "{{ $('Loop Attachments1').item.binary.data.mimeType }}",
            "data": "{{ $('Loop Attachments1').item.binary.data.data }}"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

assignments.name: order_data
assignments.value: ={{$json.status == 'error' && $json.stage =='unleashed_sync' ? ( $('Refactor unleashed payload1').first().json.order_data || null) :  ($('Refactor unleashed payload1').first().json.order_data || null ) }}
